function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Comparisons of WTP for HEMS across electricity-use and risk perception groups may lead to unequal access to health-enhancing features based on perceived risk and electricity use.","Impact":"Unequal access to health-enhancing features can exacerbate health disparities and increase the risk of disease transmission in marginalized groups.","Mitigation":"Implement targeted interventions to ensure equitable access to health-enhancing features based on risk perception and electricity use. Raise awareness about the importance of equal access to health-enhancing features.","Technologies":"Data analytics and targeted messaging to identify and reach marginalized groups. Smart technologies to monitor and optimize access to health-enhancing features.","People":"Marginalized groups, individuals with varying risk perceptions and electricity use.","Owner":"Public health authorities, policymakers, and community organizations."}]}
